sentences.en: At the same time, BENISON has obtained the support of world class te - chnology and equipments.
sentences.cn: 同时, 建立快捷、速的国际涂料资讯系统,做到全球资讯同步.

sentences.en: If you are admired by your success, my benison is warmly and hortative contemplation traversing congested crowd.
sentences.cn: 假若你成功受景仰，那麽我的祝福就是穿越拥挤的人群给你温暖鼓历的注视；

sentences.en: If you are admired by your success, my benison is warmly and hortative contemplation traversing congested crowd.
sentences.cn: 假若你成功受景仰，那么我的祝福就是穿越拥挤的人群给你温暖鼓历的注视；

sentences.en: If you can hear my benison.
sentences.cn: 如果你能听见我的祝祷。

sentences.en: Of course as the former preside of ms club he delivered his deep reins profoundly edification and brave benison to us.
sentences.cn: 当然，作为微软俱乐部的上任主席，我们的老会长，他给我们传达的是浓浓的情义、深深的教诲和美好的祝福。

trans.tran_en: a blessing, esp a spoken one
